events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role. Our team will review your submission carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience highlighted in the resume.
A recruiter has now been assigned to your case and will reach out shortly to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was successfully completed and the feedback indicates that you are a strong candidate for the software developer position.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview feedback and confirming your availability for the next stage of technical interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, 2024 at 10:00 AM UTC. Please be prepared to discuss your engineering projects and coding skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving abilities and software development knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th, 2024 at 2:00 PM UTC. This will be an opportunity to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went very well. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the role and alignment with our organizational values.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the offer details carefully and get back to us with your decision.
We have received your positive feedback on the offer, and you have expressed enthusiasm to move forward with the position.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! Weâ€™re excited to have you join our engineering team and will begin onboarding preparations immediately.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard! We look forward to supporting you during your first days at the company.
The hiring process for you has been successfully closed. We are thrilled to have you as part of our engineering team and wish you great success.
